text.p: COAL - Stellar Cape - 120,000 tonnes coal Roberts Bank/Kaohsiung $7.25 fio 40,000/38,000 15-30/1 China Steel.
Mega Hill - 110,000 tonnes coal Richards Bay/Rotterdam $6.25 fio scale load/35,000 shinc mid Jan Cobelfret.
TBN - 70,000 tonnes coal Hampton Roads/Terneuzen-Ghent $7.50 fio six days shinc Dec Bocimar.
Bona Favour - 60,000 tonnes coal Hampton Roads/Piombino $8.75 fio 2-1/2 days shinc/2-1/2 days shinc 8-14/12 Coe and Clerici.
ORE - Cosmo Trust - 100,000 tonnes ore Dampier/Shanghai $5.25 fio scale load/10,000 shex end Dec Chinese charterers.
Atlantica - 50,000 tonnes ore Saldanha/Bourgas $12.25 fio 2 days shinc/8,500 shinc Dec Belships.
